problem_text: For isosceles trapezoid A B C D, X and Y are midpoints of the legs. Find m \angle X B C if m \angle A D Y = 78.
compact_text: For isosceles trapezoid ABCD, X and Y are midpoints of the legs. Find m \angle XBC if m \angle ADY = 78.
annotat_text: For isosceles trapezoid $A B C D$, $X$ and $Y$ are midpoints of the legs. Find $m \angle X B C$ if $m \angle A D Y=78$
